thread.title: “Gossip Girl” alum Penn Badgley (aka Dan Humphrey) just got married!
thread.title_full: “Gossip Girl” alum Penn Badgley (aka Dan Humphrey) just got married!

author: Jen Juneau
title: “Gossip Girl” alum Penn Badgley (aka Dan Humphrey) just got married!
text:
“Gossip Girl” alum Penn Badgley (aka Dan Humphrey) just got married! We can call Penn Badgley a lot of things — newlywed, for example — but “Lonely Boy” isn’t one of them.
E! News is reporting that the former Gossip Girl star tied the knot with Domino Kirke, Girls star Jemima Kirke ‘s sister, in a hush-hush courthouse ceremony Monday in Brooklyn.
Badgley looked polished in a navy-blue suit, while the English-American musician and birth doula was absolutely breathtaking in an embroidered white dress with half sleeves .
“Congrats to a couple beautiful people,” one friend of the couple, Darren Will, wrote on Instagram next to a shot of the bride and groom. Congrats to a couple beautiful people ❤ 
A post shared by Darren Will (@smileoutofhell) on Feb 27, 2017 at 11:06am PST 
Domino and Jemima’s other sister, actress and badass feminist kween Lola Kirke , took to Instagram to share a photo of the three siblings , along with Domino’s son Cassius.
“When someone gets married in a courthouse , it’s really an open invitation to everyone but the beautiful bride to explore all that fashion has to offer,” a high-waisted-pink-pants-clad Lola joked in the caption. “Here, I try a look simply called ‘Pants,’ as Cassius goes for ‘That Dude from #incubus’ and Jemima experiments with ‘Off to Therapy!’ ” she added cheekily. “Congratulations @dominokirke. We love you.” 
When someone gets married in a courthouse, it's really an open invitation to everyone but the beautiful bride to explore all that fashion has to offer. Here, I try a look simply called "Pants," as Cassius goes for "That Dude from #incubus" and Jemima experiments with "Off to Therapy!" Congratulations @dominokirke. We love you. 
A post shared by Lola Kirke (@lolakirke) on Feb 27, 2017 at 8:37am PST 
It literally took every ounce of will power I possess not to flash a #boob in this #meaningful photo of my sister and me the night before her #WEDDING. Congratulations dommy. I love you that much. 
A post shared by Lola Kirke (@lolakirke) on Feb 26, 2017 at 5:55pm PST 
Jemima couldn’t help chiming in on Twitter to express her love in a way only a sibling can get away with.
“Congratulations ya shitheads!” she wrote. “@PennBadgley and @DominoKirke it’s all downhill from here. In a good way!”
Congratulations ya shitheads! @PennBadgley and @DominoKirke it's all downhill from here. In a good way!
— Jemima Kirke (@jemimakirke) February 27, 2017 We love this family’s dynamic, and think Badgley just married into a lifetime of fun.
There are very few photos of the couple together, but here’s one Domino snapped of Penn at the women’s march. Girl snagged herself a feminist husband. 
✨ ✌️️#womensmarch #womensmarchnyc #UNITE 
A post shared by Domino Kirke (@dominokirke) on Jan 21, 2017 at 7:22pm PST 
All the best wishes for a forever love that lasts even longer than Blair and Chuck’s, and Serena and Dan’s. XOXO, us!
